page.title: 20Use of land
page.content: The area around Daresbury is basically a rural area. There is arable and pature land. Commonside Farm is a typical dairy farm and all the crops that they grow are grown to provide food for all the 160 dairy cattle. They sell their cattle at he nearest market at Beeston. Popular farm is a Fruit Farm growing soft fruit and selling them on a 'Pick-your-own' basis. They also raise and sell turkeys for the Christmas market. The laboratory takes up very small space but provides the most jobs in the area, about 500 in total. There is little new building apart from the area desgnated as new town allowing the older parts to remain reletively unspoiled.
